text: Avril Lavigne is the fifth studio album by Avril Lavigne. Avril Lavigne is a Canadian singer-songwriter. Sony Music Entertainment and Epic Records released the album on November 1, 2013. Lavigne worked with many producers to make the album, such as Martin Johnson, Peter Svensson, David Hodges, Matt Squire and Chad Kroeger. The album has different music and lyrics compared to her previous album, Goodbye Lullaby (2011). It has a more pop and upbeat sound, along with power and piano ballads. It also includes electronic music, industrial rock and punk rock. The album has singing by Kroeger and Marilyn Manson. This is her only album released by Epic Records. == Track listing == * Additional producer * Vocal producer == References == Category:2013 albums Category:Avril Lavigne albums Category:Epic Records albums
title: Avril Lavigne (album)
